statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSPermissionSet)-[:POLICY]->(:AWSPolicy)-[:STATEMENT]->(n:AWSPolicyStatement) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSPermissionSet)-[:POLICY]->(:AWSPolicy)-[r:STATEMENT]->(n:AWSPolicyStatement) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSPermissionSet)-[:POLICY]->(n:AWSPolicy) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSPermissionSet)-[r:POLICY]->(:AWSPolicy) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSPermissionSet)-[r:ASSIGN_TO]->(:AWSPrincipal) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSUser)-[r:MEMBER_AWS_GROUP]->(:AWSGroup) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSPermissionSet)-[r:ATTACHED_TO]->(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSPermissionSet) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})-[r:RESOURCE]->(:AWSPermissionSet) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSUser)-[r:MEMBER_GROUP]->(:AWSGroup) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSUser) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})-[r:RESOURCE]->(:AWSUser) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSGroup) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})-[r:RESOURCE]->(:AWSGroup) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
